CustomField.description: Use this to outline the LLs that will be provided (i.e. base vs advice) plus any client specific assumptions/deviations to the normal default assumptions. Onboarding cases should only have a base & advice line as default. Additional modelling to be avoided where possible (can be covered in follow on advice/annual reviews as appropriate). This field must clearly set the partner's expectations for the modelling. Anything not outlined/agreed within this section cannot be changed once the deck is complete.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this to outline the LLs that will be provided (i.e. base vs advice) plus any client specific assumptions/deviations to the normal default assumptions. Onboarding cases should only have a base & advice line as default. Additional modelling to be avoided where possible (can be covered in follow on advice/annual reviews as appropriate). This field must clearly set the partner's expectations for the modelling. Anything not outlined/agreed within this section cannot be changed once the deck is complete.
CustomField.label: Lifeline & timeline to be modeled
